722702f-a.text:
Riverside Drive at 76e St. he promenade and terrace at76h St. William 1. McAlpine, supervising engineer.
Sept. 30, 1879
Deposited with N'PL by NC Park Dept. 1931

733247f-b.title: Squatters Colony at the Hudson [North] River.
733247f-b.text:
Squatters Colony: Shelters of the unemployed at (No. 1) West 76th Street and the North (Hudson) River, and at the Foot of Canal Street (No. 2). Both of these locations are incorrect according to the belief of the writer.

July 11, 1931
October 24, 1934

P. L. Sperr
733247f-b.folder: 76th Street and Riverside Drive, Manhattan, N.Y.

733247f-a.folder: 76th Street and Riverside Drive, Manhattan, N.Y.

722703f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, south from and including 76th Street, showing work being done oh the reconstruction of the west side of the "drive".
July 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NEG ~ 3172
